description: This Python source file defines application configuration settings using pydantic for validation, including environment variables, default values, and validation logic. It encapsulates configuration options such as server ports, logging, CORS, database, and authentication settings.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A pydantic BaseSettings subclass that defines configuration options for the application, including environment, database, CORS, and auth settings.

methods.name: _parse_list_env
methods.description: Parses environment variable values into a list of strings, supporting JSON arrays, CSV strings, and existing list or tuple values.

methods.name: get_settings
methods.description: Returns a cached singleton instance of the Settings class.
